trans-unit.source: 23/25 IMAP4rev1 commands are implemented from the main rfc3501. ‘STARTTLS’ and ‘AUTHENTICATE’ are still missing.
trans-unit.target: 23/25 IMAP4rev1命令是从主rfc3501实现的。“ STARTTLS”和“ AUTHENTICATE”仍然丢失。

trans-unit.source: Beware that the IMAP4.close() function is an IMAP function that is closing the selected mailbox, thus passing from SELECTED state to AUTH state. It does not close the TCP connection. The way to close TCP connection properly is to logout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，IMAP4.close（）函数是一个IMAP函数，它将关闭所选邮箱，从而从SELECTED状态转换为AUTH状态。它不会关闭 TCP连接。正确关闭TCP连接的方法是注销。

trans-unit.source: As said in the logging howto the logger is defined with
trans-unit.target: 如记录中所述，如何定义记录器

trans-unit.source: Developers are welcome ! If you want to improve it, fix bugs, test it with other IMAP servers, give feedback, thank you for it.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎开发者的加入! 如果你想改进它,修复错误,与其他IMAP服务器测试,给予反馈,谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Each color rectangle is an IMAP4ClientProtocol instance piece of code executed by the thread asyncio loop until it reaches a yield, waiting on I/O.
trans-unit.target: 每个颜色的矩形都是一个IMAP4ClientProtocol实例代码,由线程asyncio循环执行,直到达到yield,等待I/O。

trans-unit.source: For example, it is possible to launch 4 mono-threaded mail-fetcher processes on a 4 cores server with supervisor, and use a distribution function like len(email) % (process_num) or whatever to share equally a mail account list between the 4 processes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以在具有Supervisor的4核服务器上启动4个单线程邮件提取程序进程，并使用诸如len（email）％（process_num）之类的分发函数或在4个内核之间平均共享邮件帐户列表的功能流程。

trans-unit.source: IMAP protocol allows to run some commands in parallel. Four rules are implemented to ensure responses consistency:
trans-unit.target: IMAP协议允许并行运行一些命令。有四条规则可以确保响应的一致性。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to use threads but each IMAP4ClientProtocol instance should run in the same thread :
trans-unit.target: 它可以使用线程,但每个IMAP4ClientProtocol实例应该在同一个线程中运行。

trans-unit.source: Or in a more event based style (the IDLE command is closed at each message from server):
trans-unit.target: 或者以一种更基于事件的方式(IDLE命令在服务器每次发来消息时关闭)。

trans-unit.source: Or loading config file (for example with logging.config.dictConfig(yaml.load(file))) with this piece of yaml file:
trans-unit.target: 或者加载配置文件(例如用logging.config.dictConfig(yaml.load(file)))与这块yaml文件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you break things and you don’t understand what’s going on (I always do). For this library I have two related tools:
trans-unit.target: 有时，您破坏事物，却不了解正在发生的事情（我总是如此）。对于这个库，我有两个相关的工具：

trans-unit.source: The RFC2177 is implemented, to be able to wait for new mail messages without using CPU. The responses are pushed in an async queue, and it is possible to read them in real time. To leave the IDLE mode, it is necessary to send a “DONE” command to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在RFC2177实现，能够等待新邮件，而无需使用CPU。响应被推送到异步队列中，并且可以实时读取它们。要退出IDLE模式，必须向服务器发送“ DONE”命令。

trans-unit.source: The IMAP4ClientProtocol class is not thread safe, it uses asyncio.Event and asyncio.Condition that are not thread safe, and state change for pending commands is not locked.
trans-unit.target: IMAP4ClientProtocol类不是线程安全的，它使用不是线程安全的asyncio.Event和asyncio.Condition，并且未锁定待处理命令的状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The aim is to port the imaplib with asyncio, to benefit from the sleep or treat model.
trans-unit.target: 目的是将imaplib与asyncio一起移植，以从睡眠或对待模型中受益。

trans-unit.source: This library is inspired by imaplib and imaplib2 from Piers Lauder, Nicolas Sebrecht, Sebastian Spaeth. Some utilities functions are taken from imaplib/imaplib2 thanks to them.
trans-unit.target: 该库的灵感来自于Piers Lauder，Nicolas Sebrecht和Sebastian Spaeth 的imaplib和imaplib2。得益于它们，一些实用程序功能是从imaplib / imaplib2中获得的。

trans-unit.source: To add an imaplib or imaplib2 command you can :
trans-unit.target: 要添加一个imaplib或imaplib2命令,你可以:

trans-unit.source: Where name is ‘aioimaplib.aioimaplib’. You can set the logger parameters, either by python API
trans-unit.target: 其中名称为“ aioimaplib.aioimaplib”。您可以通过python API设置记录器参数

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] Remove imap’s Continuation from server when connection is idled. Provide imapserver.wait_state to wait for idle in tests
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]连接空闲时从服务器删除imap的Continuation。提供imapserver.wait_state以等待测试中的空闲

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] added timeout for wait_server_push of 29 minutes

[aiolib] adds a connection lost callback [test] imapserver : added APPENDUID response for APPEND cmd [test][fix] imapserver append should add to the connected user mb [test] imapserver : more accurate building of message headers (using python email module)
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]添加了连接丢失的回调[测试] imapserver：为APPEND cmd添加了APPENDUID响应[测试] [修复] imapserver追加应添加到连接的用户mb [测试] imapserver：更准确地构建了邮件头（使用python电子邮件模块） ）

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] adds uncomplete fetch command with uncomplete line [aiolib] adds uncomplete fetch command BODY without literal [aiolib] adds rfc4315 uidplus : expunge with uids [test] handles uidset better in imap server [test] refactor testing IMAP4ClientProtocol.data_received instead of _handle_responses
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]添加带有不完整行的不完整获取命令[aiolib]添加不带文字的不完整获取命令BODY [aiolib]添加rfc4315 uidplus：使用uid进行删除[测试]在imap服务器中更好地处理uidset [测试]重构测试IMAP4ClientProtocol.data_received而不是_handle_responses

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] do not filter exists line for examine command [aiolib] idle : wait for the end of data frame before pushing into the queue [test] imapserver enhancements : accepts sequence sets/returns UID when fetch by uid
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]不筛选检查命令存在的行[aiolib]空闲：等待数据帧结束，然后推入队列[测试] imapserver增强功能：接受序列集/在通过uid提取时返回UID

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] fix loading issue when importing aioimaplib with python 3.7
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]修复了使用python 3.7导入aioimaplib时的加载问题

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] fix the fix python 3.7 don’t use the 7.17
[aiolib] idle : added an idle_waiter for an event based idle loop
trans-unit.target: [aiolib] idle：为基于事件的空闲循环添加了idle_waiter

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] replace ‘async’ by is_async for python 3.7 cf #42 [aiolib] Add ID command [aiolib] Add NAMESPACE command
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]用is_async替换python 3.7 cf的'async'cf＃42 [aiolib]添加ID命令[aiolib]添加NAMESPACE命令

trans-unit.source: [aiolib] timeout for idle of 29 minutes + timeout of wait_server_push doesn’t raise TimeoutException
trans-unit.target: [aiolib]空闲29分钟的超时+ wait_server_push的超时不会引发TimeoutException

trans-unit.source: [aiolib][fix] it’s up to the user to send idle DONE
[fix] added ‘$’ and ‘;’ for fetch message with litteral regexp
trans-unit.target: [fix]添加了“ $”和“;” 用于使用立面正则表达式获取消息

trans-unit.source: [fix] bug when incomplete literal occured before a tagged status line
trans-unit.target: [修复]在标记的状态行之前出现不完整文字的错误

trans-unit.source: [fix] handling untagged responses with noop async command
trans-unit.target: [修复]使用noop async命令处理未标记的响应

trans-unit.source: [fix] when there is ::1 as localhost in /etc/hosts in a docker container [test] tests with SSL [aiolib] quote password properly in IMAP dialog
trans-unit.target: [修复]当docker容器中的/ etc / hosts中的本地主机为:: 1时[测试]使用SSL测试[aiolib]在IMAP对话框中正确引用密码
[log]将局部记录的日志限制为100个字符
[重构]在调用_handle_responses之前添加不完整的行

trans-unit.source: [test] Allow to send a html email
[test][refactor] Replace WithIMapServer inheritance by mixin combinations between ClockTestCase/TestCase and WithIMapServer
trans-unit.target: [测试] [重构]通过ClockTestCase / TestCase与WithIMapServer之间的混合组合来替换WithIMapServer继承

trans-unit.source: activate debug logs changing INFO to DEBUG at the top of the mock server and the aioimaplib
trans-unit.target: 激活调试日志,将mock服务器顶部的INFO改为DEBUG,并将aioimaplib的

trans-unit.source: add the function to the testing imapserver with a new imaplib or imaplib2 server test, i.e. test_imapserver_imaplib.py or test_imapserver_imaplib2.py respectively;
trans-unit.target: 将该函数添加到测试的imapserver中,并新建一个imaplib或imaplib2服务器测试,即分别为test_imapserver_imaplib.py或test_imapserver_imaplib2.py。

trans-unit.source: added a stop waiting server push function to interupt yield from queue.get
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个停止等待服务器推送功能,以中断queue.get的收益率。

trans-unit.source: added rfc5032 ‘within’ function to server and tests for aiolib (it is only YOUNGER/OLDER arguments)
trans-unit.target: 在服务器上添加了rfc5032'within'函数并测试了aiolib（仅YOUNGER / OLDER参数）

trans-unit.source: aioimaplib.extract_exists((yield from imap_client.select()) instead of ‘yield from imap_client.select()[0]’
async commands can be executed in parallel
trans-unit.target: 可以并行执行异步命令

trans-unit.source: do not abort when receiving unsollicited data from server
trans-unit.target: 当收到来自服务器的无解数据时,不要中止。

trans-unit.source: do not filter exists line for ‘select’ command (breaks the API). To retrieve unread mails with select, use
trans-unit.target: 不筛选“选择”命令的行（破坏API）。要使用select检索未读邮件，请使用

trans-unit.source: fix : imapserver with status of an inexistant mailbox
trans-unit.target: 修复:imapserver状态为不存在的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: fix : issue #12 Not properly buffering newlines for incomplete lines
trans-unit.target: 修正:问题12 未正确缓冲不完整行的换行。

trans-unit.source: fix : issue #15 https://github.com/bamthomas/aioimaplib/issues/15 This will break the API for FETCH with emails BODY : now the first line is the server FETCH server response line. The messages are between 1 and end of Response.lines list.
trans-unit.target: 修复：问题＃15 https://github.com/bamthomas/aioimaplib/issues/15这将破坏带有电子邮件BODY的FETCH的API：现在第一行是服务器FETCH服务器响应行。消息在1到Response.lines列表的末尾之间。

trans-unit.source: fix : remove ‘unknown data received’ logs if line is empty
trans-unit.target: 修复：如果行为空，则删除“收到的未知数据”日志

trans-unit.source: fix : remove offset problem with strip() modifying length of read data
trans-unit.target: 修正:删除strip()修改读取数据长度时的偏移问题。

trans-unit.source: fix : stop adding a space for the prefix ‘UID ‘ -> ‘UID’
trans-unit.target: 修复：停止为前缀'UID'->'UID'添加空格

trans-unit.source: fix : trailing whitespace bug causing “BAD Could not parse command” using gmail/IDLE
trans-unit.target: 修复：使用gmail / IDLE的空白空格错误，导致“ BAD无法解析命令”

trans-unit.source: fix aioimaplib bug when receiving chunked fetch data
trans-unit.target: 修复了aioimaplib在接收分块获取数据时的错误。
修正 imapserver main (需要一个 asyncio.loop.run_forever())

trans-unit.source: fix issues with coroutines in uid command
fix usernames can have ‘@’ for mockimapserver
trans-unit.target: 修复用户名可以对“ mimimapserver”使用“ @”

trans-unit.source: fix when server was lauched with main, loop is already running
trans-unit.target: 修正当服务器用main键启动时,循环已在运行的问题

trans-unit.source: if a sync command is running, the following requests (sync or async) must wait
trans-unit.target: 如果同步命令正在运行,以下请求(同步或异步)必须等待。

trans-unit.source: if an async command is running, same async commands (or with the same untagged response type) must wait
trans-unit.target: 如果一个异步命令正在运行,相同的异步命令(或具有相同的非标记响应类型)必须等待。

trans-unit.source: merge from darkrain42 [aiolib] fix interaction between idle loop and server keepalive [aiolib] fix cert verification on debian buster [test] fix imapserver literal handling on Python 3.6.5+ [test] tests: Replace calls to asyncio.async with asyncio.ensure_future
trans-unit.target: merge from darkrain42 [aiolib]fix interaction between idle loop and server keepalive [aiolib]fix cert verification on debian buster [test]fix imapserver literal handling on Python 3.6.5+[test]tests:用 asyncio.sure_future 替换对 asyncio.async 的调用。

trans-unit.source: moved timeout handling at the Command level and not IMAP4 client for fetch as proposed by @cyberlis in https://github.com/bamthomas/aioimaplib/pull/16
trans-unit.target: 移动了命令级别的超时处理，而不是@cyberlis在https://github.com/bamthomas/aioimaplib/pull/16中提出的IMAP4客户端以进行获取

trans-unit.source: ngrep on the imap test port : sudo ngrep -d lo port 12345
trans-unit.target: 在imap测试端口上使用ngrep:sudo ngrep -d lo port 12345。

trans-unit.source: pushing continuation in the queue when idled
trans-unit.target: 闲置时在队列中推送继续的内容

trans-unit.source: refactor: treating response as we read the imap server responses for a better reading
trans-unit.target: 重构:将响应处理为我们读取imap服务器的响应,以便更好地阅读

trans-unit.source: remove PARTIAL, PROXYAUTH, SETANNOTATION and GETANNOTATION commands

trans-unit.target: 删除硬编码的日志配置

trans-unit.source: server can handle SEARCH with CHARSET opt parameter (but ignores it)
trans-unit.target: 服务器可以处理带有CHARSET opt参数的SEARCH(但忽略它)

trans-unit.source: server send still here every IDLE_STILL_HERE_PERIOD_SECONDS to client when idle
trans-unit.target: 服务器空闲时,每隔IDLE_STILL_HERE_PERIOD_SECONDS向客户端发送still here。

trans-unit.source: sync command must wait pending async commands to finish
trans-unit.target: 同步命令必须等待待定的异步命令完成。

trans-unit.source: tests : [revert] add_charset to much intrusive when running a test suite
trans-unit.target: 测试。[revert]add_charset在运行测试套件时干扰性太大。

trans-unit.source: tests : added better encoding handling and message building in Mail.create
trans-unit.target: 测试:在Mail.create中增加了更好的编码处理和消息构建功能。

trans-unit.source: tests : added message_id as Mail.create parameter for testing
trans-unit.target: 测试:增加了mail.create参数的mail.id,用于测试。

trans-unit.source: tests : body text was not base64 encoded even if the header said so
trans-unit.target: 测试:正文不是base64编码的,即使头说是这样。

trans-unit.source: tests : mail_from parameter from Mail.create should handle mail@host, <mail@host>, Name <mail@host>
trans-unit.target: 测试：Mail.create中的mail_from参数应处理mail @ host，< mail @ host >，名称< mail @ host >
与其他服务器进行测试

trans-unit.source: then add the function to the aioimaplib doing almost the same test than above but the async way in test_aioimaplib.py.
trans-unit.target: 然后在 test_aioimaplib.py 中添加函数到 aioimaplib 中,做与上面几乎相同的测试,但用的是 async 方式。
